I was expecting fun and energetic moments from this movie and it kind of was, But my problems are some humour is forced, and the ending was really annoying. I was hoping to see Cap and Iron Man forgive each other for the Civil War between them but "no! come back for next."

A depressing mess. I regret bringing my kids. Remember the slogan "comics aren't just for kids anymore". Now it's, superhero movies aren't appropriate for kids. Of course they market the crap out of it with merchandise for kids.
what's with all the comic movies? You seen one you've seen them all!

AVENGERS: INFINITY WAR-2018(PG-13)-May 12. By:Clem The Movie Guy. Avengers: Infinity War is the highly-anticipated19th film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) & one of the most massively epic superhero films ever. For the past six years, The Avengers team, consisting of Tony Stark/Iron Man (Robert Downey Jr.), Thor (Chris Hemsworth), Bruce Banner/Hulk (Mark Ruffalo), Captain America/Steve Rogers (Chris Evans) & Natasha Romanoff/Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson) has been protecting the universe from destruction by evil forces. Now the team, who have gone their separate ways, are compelled to come together & join forces with the Guardians of the Galaxy team of Peter Quill/Star-Lord (Chris Pratt), Gamora (Zoe Saldana), Drax (Dave Bautista), Rocket (voiced by Bradley Cooper), Groot (voiced by Vin Diesel) & Mantis (Pom Klementieff) to battle Thanos (Josh Brolin), the most dangerous villain that any of them have ever faced. The Avengers & the Guardians along with Doctor Stephen Strange (Benedict Cumberbatch), Peter Parker/Spider-Man (Tom Holland), T’Challa/Black Panther (Chadwick Boseman), Wanda Maximoff/Scarlett Witch (Elizabeth Olsen), Sam Wilson/Falcon (Anthony Mackie), Bucky Barnes/Winter Solder (Sebastian Stan), Vision (Paul Bettany), & James “Rhodey” Rhodes/War Machine (Don Cheadle) must find a way to prevent Thanos, who has already has possession of three of the Infinity Stones, from finding the other three stones & decimating the universe to fulfill his heinous promise. Directed by Anthony & Joe Russo from a screenplay written by Christopher Markus & Stephen McFeely, Avengers: Infinity War was an exhilarating, intensely exciting & wildly funny powerhouse of a summer film. The performances from this massive cast were excellent. Avengers: Infinity War is the first of two films with the second film coming out on May 3, 2019. Infinity War has one post-credit scene that sets up the next Marvel superhero character. SEE THIS FILM in 2D, 3D or IMAX 3D, if you haven’t seen it yet!
Best Marvel film up to date!!!

4.25 Excellent humor, great action schemes with realistic movement accuracy, as to be expected Appropriated costume design; anticipate Green Hulk follow up iron in sequel Fun characters genres as with each new film, involving various Hero’s and~or Guardians or even Villains within same families; develop on the screen vividly in the roles continuance. Very cool film and anxious for the sequel

This movie is the best comic book movie hands down, it just has a lot of comic book aspects and just all round fun and dark at times but just good balance between both this movie was good in my opinion. Tell me what you think.
